name: addDelay
signature: { <Out>(f: (out: Out) => DurationInput): <In, R>(self: Schedule<Out, In, R>) => Schedule<Out, In, R>; <Out, In, R>(self: Schedule<Out, In, R>, f: (out: Out) => DurationInput): Schedule<Out, In, R>; }
description:
Adds a delay to every interval in a schedule.
*Details This function modifies a given schedule by applying an additional delay to
every interval it defines. The delay is determined by the provided function,
which takes the schedule's output and returns a delay duration.
documentation:
Adds a delay to every interval in a schedule.
*Details**

This function modifies a given schedule by applying an additional delay to
every interval it defines. The delay is determined by the provided function,
which takes the schedule's output and returns a delay duration.
